languages.text: {n}Губернатор поспешно склоняет голову в услужливом поклоне, однако вы успеваете заметить гримасу, исказившую его лицо. Ваши слова ясно пришлись Урбенду не по нутру.{/n} "В таком случае считаю уместным не изменять сложившийся порядок вещей — вас представит губернаторский род Драйвстемов".

{n}The governor hurriedly lowers his head in an obliging bow, but you catch a glimpse of the grimace on his face. He is clearly displeased by your words.{/n} "In that case, I think it's appropriate not to change the established order of things — you will be represented by the governor house of Drivestem."
languages.original_text: {n}Губернатор поспешно склоняет голову в услужливом поклоне, однако вы успеваете заметить гримасу, исказившую его лицо. Ваши слова ясно пришлись Урбенду не по нутру.{/n} "В таком случае считаю уместным не изменять сложившийся порядок вещей — вас представит губернаторский род Драйвстемов".

traits.locale_text: {n}The governor hurriedly lowers his head in an obliging bow, but you catch a glimpse of the grimace on his face. He is clearly displeased by your words.{/n} "In that case, I think it's appropriate not to change the established order of things — you will be represented by the governor house of Drivestem."

{n}The governor hurriedly lowers his head in an obliging bow, but you catch a glimpse of the grimace on his face. He is clearly displeased by your words.{/n} "In that case, I think it's appropriate not to change the established order of things — you will be represented by the governor house of Drivestem."

{n}The governor hurriedly lowers his head in an obliging bow, but you catch a glimpse of the grimace on his face. He is clearly displeased by your words.{/n} "In that case, I think it's appropriate not to change the established order of things — you will be represented by the governor house of Drivestem."

languages.text: {n}总督连忙低下了头，义务性地向你鞠了一躬，但你瞥见了他脸上狰狞的表情。很显然，他对你的话很是不满。{/n}“既然如此，我认为还是不要改变既定的秩序会比较好。您将由德莱夫斯塔总督家族来代表。”
languages.original_text: {n}The governor hurriedly lowers his head in an obliging bow, but you catch a glimpse of the grimace on his face. He is clearly displeased by your words.{/n} "In that case, I think it's appropriate not to change the established order of things — you will be represented by the governor house of Drivestem."

traits.locale_text: {n}总督连忙低下了头，义务性地向你鞠了一躬，但你瞥见了他脸上狰狞的表情。很显然，他对你的话很是不满。{/n}“既然如此，我认为还是不要改变既定的秩序会比较好。您将由德莱夫斯塔总督家族来代表。”

languages.text: {n}El gobernador agacha la cabeza rápida y obsequiosamente, pero logras ver una mueca en su cara. Tus palabras le desagradan sobremanera.{/n} «En ese caso, creo que lo apropiado es respetar el orden establecido. Le representará la casa del gobernador, los Drivestem».
languages.original_text: {n}The governor hurriedly lowers his head in an obliging bow, but you catch a glimpse of the grimace on his face. He is clearly displeased by your words.{/n} "In that case, I think it's appropriate not to change the established order of things — you will be represented by the governor house of Drivestem."

traits.locale_text: {n}El gobernador agacha la cabeza rápida y obsequiosamente, pero logras ver una mueca en su cara. Tus palabras le desagradan sobremanera.{/n} «En ese caso, creo que lo apropiado es respetar el orden establecido. Le representará la casa del gobernador, los Drivestem».

languages.text: {n}総督は服従を示すために急いで頭を下げるが、不機嫌そうな表情が垣間見える。今の言葉を聞いて、明らかに不愉快そうだ。{/n}「であれば、確立された秩序を無為に変えないほうが良いでしょう。ドライブステム家が代表を務めさせていただきます」
languages.original_text: {n}The governor hurriedly lowers his head in an obliging bow, but you catch a glimpse of the grimace on his face. He is clearly displeased by your words.{/n} "In that case, I think it's appropriate not to change the established order of things — you will be represented by the governor house of Drivestem."

traits.locale_text: {n}総督は服従を示すために急いで頭を下げるが、不機嫌そうな表情が垣間見える。今の言葉を聞いて、明らかに不愉快そうだ。{/n}「であれば、確立された秩序を無為に変えないほうが良いでしょう。ドライブステム家が代表を務めさせていただきます」

languages.text: {n}Der Gouverneur senkt rasch den Kopf und verbeugt sich gehorsam, aber dir entgeht bei einem kurzen Blick die Grimasse in seinem Gesicht nicht. Er ist offensichtlich unzufrieden mit deinen Worten.{/n} "In dem Fall ist es wohl angebracht, die gewohnte Ordnung nicht zu verändern – Ihr werdet vom Gouverneurshaus Drivestem repräsentiert."
languages.original_text: {n}The governor hurriedly lowers his head in an obliging bow, but you catch a glimpse of the grimace on his face. He is clearly displeased by your words.{/n} "In that case, I think it's appropriate not to change the established order of things — you will be represented by the governor house of Drivestem."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Gouverneur senkt rasch den Kopf und verbeugt sich gehorsam, aber dir entgeht bei einem kurzen Blick die Grimasse in seinem Gesicht nicht. Er ist offensichtlich unzufrieden mit deinen Worten.{/n} "In dem Fall ist es wohl angebracht, die gewohnte Ordnung nicht zu verändern – Ihr werdet vom Gouverneurshaus Drivestem repräsentiert."

languages.text: {n}Le gouverneur s'empresse de baisser la tête en signe d'obéissance, mais pas assez vite pour vous empêcher de remarquer une grimace. Vos paroles l'ont visiblement contrarié.{/n} « En ce cas, je pense qu'il vaut mieux s'en tenir à l'ordre établi. La maison du gouverneur Drivestem vous représentera. »
languages.original_text: {n}The governor hurriedly lowers his head in an obliging bow, but you catch a glimpse of the grimace on his face. He is clearly displeased by your words.{/n} "In that case, I think it's appropriate not to change the established order of things — you will be represented by the governor house of Drivestem."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le gouverneur s'empresse de baisser la tête en signe d'obéissance, mais pas assez vite pour vous empêcher de remarquer une grimace. Vos paroles l'ont visiblement contrarié.{/n} « En ce cas, je pense qu'il vaut mieux s'en tenir à l'ordre établi. La maison du gouverneur Drivestem vous représentera. »

languages.text: {n}Vali başını alelacele, itaatkârca eğse de yüzündeki hafif buruşma, gözünden kaçmıyor. Sözlerinden hoşnut kalmadığı açık.{/n} "Bu durumda kurulu düzende herhangi bir değişiklik yapmamanın uygun olduğunu düşünüyorum. Vali hanesi konumundaki Drivestem tarafından temsil edileceksiniz."
languages.original_text: {n}The governor hurriedly lowers his head in an obliging bow, but you catch a glimpse of the grimace on his face. He is clearly displeased by your words.{/n} "In that case, I think it's appropriate not to change the established order of things — you will be represented by the governor house of Drivestem."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vali başını aceleyle, itaatkâr bir şekilde eğiyor ancak yüzündeki hafif buruşma gözünden kaçmıyor. Sözlerinden hoşnut kalmadığı açık.{/n} "Bu durumda kurulu düzende herhangi bir değişiklik yapmamanın uygun olduğunu düşünüyorum. Yönetici hane konumundaki Drivestem tarafından temsil edileceksiniz."
